symbols.name: sap.ui.webc
symbols.description: Namespace for UI5 Web Components Retrofit libraries

deprecated.text: this Web Components consumption model has been discarded. An alternative consumption model is planned for the future.
this Web Components consumption model has been discarded. An alternative consumption model is planned for the future.

symbols.name: sap.ui.webc.common.WebComponent
symbols.description: Base Class for Web Components. Web Components are agnostic UI elements which can be integrated into the UI5 programming model by using this wrapper control. This wrapper control takes care to propagate the properties, the aggregations and the events. It also ensures to render the control and put the aggregated controls in the dedicated slots of the Web Component.

experimental.text: The API might change. It is not intended for productive usage yet!

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: Optional ID for the new control; generated automatically if no non-empty ID is given Note: this can be omitted, no matter whether mSettings will be given or not!

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Object with initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructs and initializes a Web Component Wrapper with the given sId and settings.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class to be created

parameters.name: oClassInfo

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.description: the metadata object describing the class: tag, properties, aggregations, events etc.

parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object. If not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.webc.common.WebComponent.

symbols.name: sap.ui.webc.common.WebComponent.MetadataOptions
symbols.description: The structure of the "metadata" object which is passed when inheriting from sap.ui.core.Element using its static "extend" method. See {@link sap.ui.core.Element.extend} for details on its usage.

experimental.text: The API might change. It is not intended for productive usage yet!

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: fully qualified name of the class that is described by this metadata object

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: static info to construct the metadata from

constructor.description: Creates a new metadata object for a WebComponent Wrapper subclass.
